replies.body: Shura is my only duo, everytime we play he's the only man in the world to make me not tilt. we go duo bot and or perhaps i jungle and he goes bot. Ever since we met back when i was silver 1 and he was platinum 1 i knew he was the one. if you're reading this shura i love you more than ailee ever will
Omg Praxix :$, im in tears right now! You're my favourite duo que partner, I would never change you for anyone! You're the best!!! Tears fully stacked {{item:3070}}

My duo queue partner is my little brother. I play ADC and Jungle while he plays Support and Mid Lane. If either of us have a crappy game we just like take a break and do separate normals, but it just isn't the same. Even if we stay in Silver ELO Hell for the rest of our lives, he's still better then BunnyFuFu on Support {{champion:412}}. 

If we cheese a game we end it with a huge high five or a brofist, cus that's what bros do.
Damn, now I want a brother. My older brother died when he was 2. I never got to meet him. Now I'm stuck with two younger sisters. IDK how teemo split in two, but he managed.
the mute button is my duo everytime i use it i always win Kappa
{{champion:99}} Wise decision summoner.

After reading all these post feeling like {{champion:32}}

I find it very hard to make friends on this game. The chat rooms don't help at all it's just full of spam and ads. League should think about imputing a system for recruiting people and expanding your friends list because with the way things are now, you either know somebody in real life, get lucky and meet a nice person through the game, or you stuck.
Yeah. Most of my friends quit league or play with different people and the people in my friends list I play with are never on. Need to find a new group{{champion:32}}
I dont have a duo partner because all my friends hate playing with me.
I tried to duo with my ex-girlfriend yesterday...It didn't go so well...
My friend is Diemend and I am gold. fuk noob he carry.

Junerebellion, my best friend, and the person that dragged me onto the rift, is my duo. It's almost embarrassing I can't play without her. I support, she adcs. She's only played jinx since we started over a year ago. When we lane together she carries, when we dont, we feed. We know what to say in the lobby to make sure we end up together.
What do you say?
BOT OR FEEEEEEEEEEED BITCHEEEEZ

Music is my duo partner, the right tracks playing put me in the perfect play mood.  Since so many of the professionals are still lower in ranks, going to let them advance first, still waiting and refining.  I used to have a duo but he decided to be childish about personal things.  Goodbye!

Me an' mah buddy Icymask, we the best botlane duo you ever seen. Whether we running Draven/Sona like the old school or kickin it with Blitzkrank/Fiddle, we gonna wreck like Miley Cyrus on Ecstacy. 

Shout out to the best bro you could ever have, dat cold, cold, Icymask...
Mah main **dude** **can** and always will **open** my heart
i find it extremely ironic that pandora is playing i wana know what love is while reading this comment lol. ty pandora.

My duo q partner is bronze. 

1. Drop to bronze
2. Queue up
3. Select the champion {{champion:61}}. This is important because ori is made of bronze so bronze players can't see from the camouflage. 
4. They will feed you LP. (Works like an actual duo q partner)
5. Profit.
I need a Duo partner, much less, a friend :D
maxmon is my duo queue partner, he deserves challenger but he stays in gold to hang out with me. #truehomie

My duo is Sunchuu. We both started low bronze together and scrambled up to silver last season. This year we're determined for gold, and to be honest, if it wasn't for her I still might be bronze. Best ADC/Support I've ever seen. Love you <3

I'd never have even found League if not for you <3 You make the wins sweet and the losses hilarious, and even when I get upset, I can count on you to turn it around and make me want to play again. I refuse to duo with anyone else~ Best Teemo NA <3 Love you more.

I have two amazing partners who I love dearly. One is my fiance. We have very opposite playing styles, with my conservative patience and his ultra-aggressive, risky strats. And for some reason it always works out. We rarely play the same lane, but it's only so that we can keep the team cohesive and cooperative, so that we always know we have at least two out of four lanes in the bag. He can play any role, though I mostly play support. I admire the fact that he's played ranked on every champion that was released before December, and had positive scores on them all.

My other partner is fantastic. I met him in the gold-crunch of last season, and  he's an intensely amazing mentor. I've played better since I met him, and understood more about the game. We've exchanged skins, stories of our lives, plans for the future, and the joys and woes of all things internet. I only narrowly missed beta, and I've had thousands of good games and happy moments, but meeting this friend...this wonderful duo partner...might be the highlight of what League has given me. A strong, lasting friendship I never would have had.

furinkai is my duo queue partner. he is so good at jg and he always keeps the teams spirit up and organizes dragon and baron kills with absolute perfection and he dives through enemy minion waves like a tempest.
he reaches the carries in a flash and instantly executes them. he is even thoughtful for the other team, he kills them fast to end their suffering
and misery. he also excels in other roles such as top and mid and support and he uses creative and intuitive builds in order to maximize each champions potential
he is a 10/10 duo q partner i would marry him anyday
the end

(he's holding me hostage as i write this, pls send help).

My duo partner and I met while laning bot together in ranked solo queue. Once we realized we were drift compatible, there was no turning back.
